resources.string: The country you entered cannot be found
Date you entered appears to be in the future
Please enter the cow\'s Ear Tag Number or Name
Please enter the cow\'s Ear Tag Number
Please enter the Dam\'s embryo number
Please enter the quantity of the milk produced in KGs
Please enter the Sire\'s straw number
The event has been successfully recorded
You cannot add an event that occured more than one month ago
Unable to authenticate you. Please try logging in again
Please wait while GPS narrows down on your location
It appears like you are logging in from an unusual device. Do you still want to login?
You cannot enter milk production data that is more than one month old
The quantity of milk you entered is too much
In the next screen, you will be required to register the calf that has been born. Click next to register the calf
In the next screen, you will be required to register the acquired cow. Click next to register the cow
It appears like your old mobile number is not registered in the system. Contact the system admin for more details.
A problem occurred while trying to connect to the Server
There seems to be a problem with the data you are trying to send.
You have already entered the amount you got from this cow from this date
You need to enable your GPS before register. Press Okay to enable GPS
This application requires an internet connection for it to work/. Press Okay to enable the internet
You are using a Sim card that has not been used before in this system.
Something went wrong. Try resending the data
You have been successfully registered. You will receive an SMS instructing you on how to login
